document_api_meta.title: Get Transactions by Statement
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Retrieves the details of a statement, including the transactions, which can be a standard order transaction, an adjustment transaction, or a reserve-related transaction. For the SKU-level details of an order transaction, refer to [Get Transactions by Order](650a6734defece02be67d724).
Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US cross-border sellers, data before 2025-04-30 is unavailable).

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc: The returned results will be sorted by the specified field. Only supports `order_create_time`.

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
The sort order for the `sort_field` parameter. 
Default: ASC 
Possible values:
- ASC: Ascending order
- DESC: Descending order

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
The number of results to be returned per page. 
Default: 20
Valid range: [1-100]

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

response_param.name: ^id
response_param.desc: The statement ID.

response_param.name: ^create_time
response_param.desc:
The time when the statement was generated. Unix timestamp. 
Statements are generated daily at 00:00 UTC.

response_param.name: ^status
response_param.desc: The statement status. Only supports `SETTLED`.

response_param.name: ^currency
response_param.desc: The three-digit currency code in ISO 4217 format.

response_param.name: ^payable_amount
response_param.desc:
The final amount paid out after accounting for reserve funds.
Formula: total_settlement_amount + total_reserve_amount

response_param.name: ^total_reserve_amount
response_param.desc:
The total amount withheld from settlement based on TikTok Shop Reserve Policy. Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for more information.
- A positive amount indicates the funds that have been released.
- A negative amount indicates the funds being withheld from the settlement.

Applicable only for UK and US local sellers.

response_param.name: ^total_settlement_amount
response_param.desc:
The total settlement amount.

Formula: total_revenue_amount - total_shipping_cost_amount - total_fee_tax_amount - total_adjustment_amount

response_param.name: ^total_settlement_breakdown
response_param.desc: The list of amounts that directly contribute to `total_settlement_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^total_revenue_amount
response_param.desc: The total revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the net sales amount.

response_param.name: ^^total_shipping_cost_amount
response_param.desc: The total shipping costs at the time of order settlement.

response_param.name: ^^total_fee_tax_amount
response_param.desc: The total fees and taxes charged by the platform at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded.

response_param.name: ^^total_adjustment_amount
response_param.desc:
The total adjustment amount based on TikTok Shop policy. 
Refer to `transactions.type` for the list of adjustment-related policies.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The number of transaction records in the statement.

response_param.name: ^transactions
response_param.desc: The list of transaction records in the statement. Each transaction corresponds to an order, an adjustment, or a reserve-related transaction.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The transaction ID.

response_param.name: ^^type
response_param.desc:
The transaction type.

**Standard transactions**
- `ORDER`: A transaction related to an order settlement.
- `RESERVE`: A transaction involving collection or release of reserve funds.
- If the transaction is an adjustment, it returns one of the following values:

**Platform-related adjustments**
- `CHARGE_BACK`: Charges returned to a payment card after a customer has successfully disputed an item on their account statement or transactions report.
- `CUSTOMER_SERVICE_COMPENSATION`: Extra compensation or compensation paid to a customer after the after-sales period by customer service.
- `DEDUCTIONS_INCURRED_BY_SELLER`: Deduction arising from customer dissatisfaction as a result of the seller's responsibility. This includes issues such as fraud, empty packages, items that do not match the product display page, or items of lower value than advertised.
- `GMV_PAYMENT_FOR_ADS`: Amount used to pay for your advertisement if you are enabled "auto pay ads with shop GMV", or to pay for Tiktok Promote ads orders.
- `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller.
- `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller.
- `PLATFORM_PENALTY`: Penalty imposed for a violation of TikTok Shop policies (the corresponding amount has been deducted from the seller's account). For details, please refer to the email notification sent to the seller.
- `PROMOTION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when a seller takes part in a platform promotion and there are differences between the promotion price and the actual amount paid by the seller.
- `REBATE`: A discount on referral fees offered by TikTok Shop to eligible sellers.
- `PLATFORM_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller after the seller successfully appealed for a customer dispute.
- `PLATFORM_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded under TikTok's refund without return policy (the seller is not responsible).
- `COFUNDED_CREATOR_REWARDS`: Fees charged for joining the co-funded creator rewards program to reward creator activities.

**Logistics-related adjustments**
- `FBT_WAREHOUSE_SERVICE_FEE`: Amount charged by TikTok Fulfillment Portal (Pipak) for warehousing-related bills incurred by the seller under the Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) service.
- `LOGISTICS_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded due to logistics-related issues (e.g. lost or damaged order).
- `SHIPPING_FEE_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences or mistakes with the shipping fee paid by the seller.
- `SHIPPING_FEE_COMPENSATION`: Compensation given to sellers due to differences between the actual shipping fee and the pre-paid shipping fee.
- `SHIPPING_FEE_REBATE`: Shipping fee rebate provided to the seller as part of their participation in a platform campaign.
- `SAMPLE_SHIPPING_FEE`: Fees charged for sending samples using the TikTok logistics provider.
- `SELLER_MISSION_REWARD`: Platform provided cash reward for seller mission completion.
- `Violation fee （settlement fee）`: The deduction to cover the cost of buyer's losses for the unpleasant experience of the buyer due to an issue that is the seller's responsibility.
- `Violation fee （credit card）`: The amount owed to TikTok Shop from previous transactions, charged to your primary credit card.
- `Bill payment （negative balance）`: The amount you owe TikTok Shop, charged to your primary credit card.
-  `Sales proceed（negative balance） `:Sales proceed that is ready to pay for negeative balance.
-  `Bill deduction for negative balance `:Deduction for the amount you owe TikTok Shop after all platform fees are deducted from your net earnings.

**Miscellaneous adjustments**
`OTHER_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment for other reasons.

response_param.name: ^^order_id
response_param.desc:
The order ID.
Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID.

response_param.name: ^^order_create_time
response_param.desc: The creation time of the order. Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^^adjustment_id
response_param.desc:
The adjustment ID if the transaction is an adjustment.
Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID.

response_param.name: ^^adjustment_order_id
response_param.desc: The order ID associated with the adjustment, if any.

response_param.name: ^^adjustment_amount
response_param.desc:
The adjustment amount based on TikTok Shop policy. 
Refer to `transactions.type` for the list of adjustment-related policies.

response_param.name: ^^settlement_amount
response_param.desc:
The settlement amount for the order.

Formula: revenue_amount - shipping_cost_amount - fee_tax_amount - adjustment_amount

response_param.name: ^^revenue_amount
response_param.desc: The revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all amounts in `revenue_breakdown`.

response_param.name: ^^revenue_breakdown
response_param.desc: The list of amounts that directly contribute to `revenue_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^subtotal_before_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The total price of all order items before any seller discounts and platform discounts are deducted. This is equivalent to the shop's gross sales.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_subtotal_before_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The total price of all refunded items before any seller discounts. This is equivalent to the shop's gross sales refund.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_discount_amount
response_param.desc:
The total amount of discounts funded by the seller, including:
- Seller promotions (Product Discount, Flash Deal, Buy More Save More, Voucher and Bundle Deal)
- Seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns
- Seller discounts during a campaign

response_param.name: ^^^seller_discount_refund_amount
response_param.desc: Discounts returned to the sellers due to returns or refunds.

response_param.name: ^^^cod_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The cash on delivery service fees charged to buyers.
Applicable only for Saudi Arabia.

response_param.name: ^^^refund_cod_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The refund for cash on delivery service fees.
Applicable only for Saudi Arabia.

response_param.name: ^^shipping_cost_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping costs at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in `shipping_cost_breakdown`.

response_param.name: ^^shipping_cost_breakdown
response_param.desc: The list of amounts that directly contribute to `shipping_cost_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^actual_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The actual shipping fee calculated based on the weight/dimensions measured by the carrier. For details, check `shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component`.

response_param.name: ^^^shipping_fee_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping fee subsidies and incentives provided by the platform. This includes all subsidies regardless of fulfillment channels or policies. For details, check `shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component`.

response_param.name: ^^^customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The actual shipping fee borne by the customer, calculated based on the product weight uploaded by the seller. Negative numbers refer to the refunded amount of customer-paid shipping fees

response_param.name: ^^^return_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of returns.

response_param.name: ^^^replacement_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods replacement.

Applicable only for Indonesia.

response_param.name: ^^^exchange_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods exchange.

Applicable only for Indonesia.

response_param.name: ^^^signature_confirmation_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The fee incurred for packages requiring signature confirmation services.

response_param.name: ^^^shipping_insurance_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping insurance fee incurred by the seller for purchasing additional TikTok shipping insurance services.

response_param.name: ^^^fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount
response_param.desc:
A reimbursement from TikTok Shop for Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) orders that don't qualify for free shipping.
Applicable only for the US.

response_param.name: ^^^return_shipping_label_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The fee borne by the customer to cover the cost of return labels. This fee is collected on the seller's behalf and settled according to the agreed payment terms.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_self_shipping_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: A service fee charged for orders shipped through your own logistics provider. Applies to packages that don't meet the exemption criteria.

response_param.name: ^^^return_shipping_fee_paid_buyer_amount
response_param.desc: Reimbursement for the shipping fees paid by customers to return packages

response_param.name: ^^^failed_delivery_subsidy_amount
response_param.desc: For shipping fee from failed deliveries, you pay up to a standard rate, and TikTok Shop covers the remaining amount.

response_param.name: ^^^shipping_fee_guarantee_reimbursement
response_param.desc: Reimbursement from the Shipping Fee Guarantee Program for failed deliveries or returns

response_param.name: ^^^fbt_free_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc: This is the fee that you cover when offering customers free shipping through FBT.

response_param.name: ^^^free_return_subsidy_amount
response_param.desc: Reimbursement for the platform-funded portion of return shipping fees, as part of the free returns offered to customers.

response_param.name: ^^^supplementary_component
response_param.desc: Supplementary costs for your reference. These amounts do not directly contribute to `shipping_cost_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^platform_shipping_fee_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping fee discount provided in accordance with a campaign policy. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^promo_shipping_incentive_amount
response_param.desc: The additional shipping incentive that the seller will receive if the seller signed up for the Co-Funded Free Shipping Program. A negative amount indicates a reversal of incentives due to order refunds attributed to the seller's responsibility. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^shipping_fee_subsidy_amount
response_param.desc:
The shipping fee subsidy funded by the platform for seller shipping. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`.
- Positive amount represents a subsidy received by the seller.
- Negative amount represents a subsidy that the seller must return to TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^^seller_shipping_fee_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping fee discount provided by sellers.

response_param.name: ^^^^customer_shipping_fee_offset_amount
response_param.desc:
The fee to offset TikTok Shop Shipping Incentive or customer-paid shipping fee, resulting in a net charge of $0 to the seller.

Applicable only for the US.

response_param.name: ^^^^fbm_shipping_cost_amount
response_param.desc: The shipping fee incurred by the seller for using TikTok Shipping. This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^fbt_shipping_cost_amount
response_param.desc:
The shipping fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`.

Applicable only for EU and UK.

response_param.name: ^^^^fbt_fulfillment_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The shipping and warehouse fulfillment fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`.

Applicable only for the US.

response_param.name: ^^^^fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount
response_param.desc: (**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `shipping_cost_breakdown.fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount` instead for the relevant details.)

response_param.name: ^^^^return_refund_subsidy_amount
response_param.desc: For shipping fee from returns and refunds, you pay up to a standard rate, and TikTok Shop covers the remaining amount.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^refunded_customer_shipping_fee_amount
response_param.desc: Shipping fee returned to customers due returns and refunds.Does not include subsidies.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^customer_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: The shipping fee borne by the customer.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_customer_shipping_fee
response_param.desc: Refund the shipping fee borne by the customer. Include subsidies.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^fee_tax_amount
response_param.desc: The total fees and taxes charged by TikTok Shop at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in `fee_tax_breakdown`.

response_param.name: ^^fee_tax_breakdown
response_param.desc: The list of amounts that directly contribute to `fee_tax_amount`.

response_param.name: ^^^fee
response_param.desc: The list of fees.

response_param.name: ^^^^platform_commission_amount
response_param.desc: The commission amount charged by the platform.

response_param.name: ^^^^referral_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The referral fee charged for processing successful orders.

Applicable only for the US.

response_param.name: ^^^^refund_administration_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The 20% refund administration fee deducted from the total refunded referral fee amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^transaction_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The transaction fee charged for processing successful orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^credit_card_handling_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The handling fee charged when the buyer pays with a credit card.

response_param.name: ^^^^affiliate_commission_amount
response_param.desc: The commission amount charged to the seller for payment to the creator.

response_param.name: ^^^^affiliate_commission_amount_before_pit
response_param.desc:
The affiliate ads commission paid to a creator before any personal income tax withholding.

Applicable only for SEA markets.

response_param.name: ^^^^affiliate_partner_commission_amount
response_param.desc: The commission amount for purchases through affiliate partner links.

response_param.name: ^^^^affiliate_ads_commission_amount
response_param.desc: The commission for eligible orders from ads.

response_param.name: ^^^^sfp_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for participation in the [Seller Free Shipping Programme].

response_param.name: ^^^^live_specials_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for participation in the [LIVE Specials Programme].

response_param.name: ^^^^bonus_cashback_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for participation in the bonus cashback program.

response_param.name: ^^^^mall_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for using TikTok Shop Mall.

response_param.name: ^^^^voucher_xtra_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for participation in the Voucher Xtra program.

response_param.name: ^^^^flash_sales_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for participation in flash sales.

response_param.name: ^^^^cofunded_promotion_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for co-funded promotions.

response_param.name: ^^^^pre_order_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee charged for participation in the pre-order program.

response_param.name: ^^^^tsp_commission_amount
response_param.desc: The commission amount charged by TikTok Shop Partners (TSP).

response_param.name: ^^^^dt_handling_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The handling fee charged for orders that are fulfilled by Dilayani Tokopedia.

response_param.name: ^^^^epr_pob_service_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The eco-contributions TikTok Shop pays on your behalf to the qualified producer responsibility organization (PRO).

response_param.name: ^^^^seller_paylater_handling_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The handling fee charged to the seller for participation in the PayLater program.

response_param.name: ^^^^fee_per_item_sold_amount
response_param.desc:
The fee charged to sellers by the platform for each item sold. This is equivalent to the sum of all per-item fees for all SKUs in the order.
Applicable only for the Brazil market.

response_param.name: ^^^^cofunded_creator_bonus_amount
response_param.desc: The portion of the creator bonus that you co-fund as part of the commission boost campaign.

response_param.name: ^^^^dynamic_commission_amount
response_param.desc:
The dynamic commission fee is the amount that the platform charges to all sellers for every successfully delivered order.
Applicable only for Indonesia.

response_param.name: ^^^^external_affiliate_marketing_fee_amount
response_param.desc: The service fee for participating in the External Affiliate Marketing Solution Program, as stated during registration.

response_param.name: ^^^^vn_fix_infrastructure_fee
response_param.desc: Infrastructure fees are a fixed service fee that TikTok Shop charges for providing, maintaining, and developing infrastructure for delivery services. It applies to delivered orders on the main order level.

response_param.name: ^^^^affiliate_commission_deposit
response_param.desc: The amount reserved for creator commissions after an order is paid. Applies only to commissions tied to order volume and is based on the highest earning rate.

response_param.name: ^^^^affiliate_commission_release
response_param.desc: The commission deposit refunded to you after order settlement. Applies only to commissions tied to order volume.

response_param.name: ^^^^tap_shop_ads_commission
response_param.desc: The advertising commission cost a merchant pays to TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP).

response_param.name: ^^^^shipping_fee_guarantee_service_fee
response_param.desc: A flat service fee charged for each order under the Shipping Fee Guarantee Program

response_param.name: ^^^^installation_service_fee
response_param.desc: The fee TikTok Shop charges you for using platform installation service

response_param.name: ^^^^campaign_resource_fee
response_param.desc: Amount of campaign resource fee from program seller joining in

response_param.name: ^^^tax
response_param.desc: The list of tax amounts.

response_param.name: ^^^^vat_amount
response_param.desc:
The VAT paid by the platform on the seller's behalf. 

Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^import_vat_amount
response_param.desc:
The import VAT, a tax paid on goods bought in one country and imported into another. 
Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. In Japan, it refers to the Japan Consumption Tax (JCT).

response_param.name: ^^^^customs_duty_amount
response_param.desc:
The customs duties, a type of tax on cross-border goods collected by governments. 

Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^customs_clearance_amount
response_param.desc:
The fees charged by logistic suppliers for customs clearance services. 

Applicable only for cross-border shop orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^sst_amount
response_param.desc: The sales and service tax (SST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Malaysia, effective January 1, 2024.

response_param.name: ^^^^gst_amount
response_param.desc: The goods and services tax (GST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Singapore, effective January 1, 2023.

response_param.name: ^^^^iva_amount
response_param.desc: The Mexican VAT that TikTok Shop is required to withhold on your taxable products and remit to the tax authority.

response_param.name: ^^^^isr_amount
response_param.desc: The Mexican federal income tax that TikTok Shop is required to withhold.

response_param.name: ^^^^anti_dumping_duty_amount
response_param.desc: The anti-dumping duties collected by governments for import goods.

response_param.name: ^^^^local_vat_amount
response_param.desc: The VAT paid by the platform on the seller's behalf. Applicable only for local shop orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^pit_amount
response_param.desc: The personal income tax (PIT) paid by the platform on the seller's behalf.

response_param.name: ^^supplementary_component
response_param.desc: Supplementary costs for your reference. These amounts do not directly contribute to the settlement amount.

response_param.name: ^^^customer_payment_amount
response_param.desc: The total amount paid by the customer.

response_param.name: ^^^customer_refund_amount
response_param.desc: The exact amount refunded to the customer.

response_param.name: ^^^platform_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The discounts funded by the platform, such as coupons and campaign discounts.

response_param.name: ^^^platform_discount_refund_amount
response_param.desc: The platform discounts to be reversed (and deducted from the final settlement) if the order was refunded as a result of the seller's responsibility.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_cofunded_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_cofunded_discount_refund_amount
response_param.desc: The seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns that was refunded to the seller.

response_param.name: ^^^platform_cofunded_discount_amount
response_param.desc: The platform's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns.

response_param.name: ^^^platform_cofunded_discount_refund_amount
response_param.desc: The platform's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns that was refunded to the platform.

response_param.name: ^^^retail_delivery_fee_amount
response_param.desc:
The final retail delivery fee for deliveries in Colorado, US. For more information, see [Colorado Retail Delivery Fee FAQ](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?knowledge_id=2459780628350762&default_language=en&identity=1).


Formula: retail_delivery_fee_payment + retail_delivery_fee_refund

response_param.name: ^^^retail_delivery_fee_payment_amount
response_param.desc: The retail delivery fee for deliveries in Colorado, US. For more information, see [Colorado Retail Delivery Fee FAQ](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?knowledge_id=2459780628350762&default_language=en&identity=1).

response_param.name: ^^^retail_delivery_fee_refund_amount
response_param.desc: The retail delivery fee subsidy by the platform for losses due to returns, refunds, or other issues in Colorado, US.

response_param.name: ^^^sales_tax_amount
response_param.desc:
The final sales tax to be paid by the customer for the product and delivery. 

Formula: sales_tax_payment_amount - sales_tax_refund_amount

response_param.name: ^^^sales_tax_payment_amount
response_param.desc: The expected sales tax to be paid by the customer for the product and delivery.

response_param.name: ^^^sales_tax_refund_amount
response_param.desc: The sales tax amount returned to the customer in the event of a refund.

response_param.name: ^^reserve_id
response_param.desc: The ID of a reserve transaction.

response_param.name: ^^reserve_amount
response_param.desc:
The amount withheld from settlement based on TikTok Shop Reserve Policy. Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for more information.
- A positive amount indicates funds that have been released.
- A negative amount indicates funds being withheld from the settlement.

response_param.name: ^^associated_order_id
response_param.desc: The order ID associated with the reserve transaction.

response_param.name: ^^reserve_status
response_param.desc:
The status of the reserve funds.
Possible values:
- COLLECTED: A portion of the order's settlement amount has been withheld as reserve funds.
- RELEASED: The previously reserved funds have been released and paid out to the seller.

response_param.name: ^^estimated_release_time
response_param.desc:
The estimated date when the reserve funds will be released and paid out to the seller. Unix timestamp. 
Returns an empty value if the reserve funds have already been released.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to have access to transaction and settlement amount information by order, and reconcile seller's settlements from TikTok Shop against the orders.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to have access to transaction and settlement amount information by order, and reconcile your settlements from TikTok Shop against the orders.
